00034 /**
00035  * \file
00036  *         A brief description of what this file is.
00037  * \author
00038  *         Adam Dunkels <adam@sics.se>

00040 
00041 #include "radio-sniffer.h"
00042 #include "contiki-net.h"
00043 #include "contiki-esb.h"
00044 #include "net/hc.h"
00045 #include "net/tcpdump.h"
00046 
00047 #include <stdio.h>
00048 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 PROCESS(radio_sniffer_process, "Radio sniffer");
00050 AUTOSTART_PROCESSES(&radio_sniffer_process);
00051 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 static void
00053 sniffer_callback(const struct radio_driver *driver)
00054 {
00055   static char buf[40];
00056   static u8_t packet[UIP_BUFSIZE];
00057   static int len;
00058   len = driver->read(packet, sizeof(packet));
00059   if(len > 0) {
00060     leds_blink();
00061     len = hc_inflate(packet, len);
00062     tcpdump_format(packet, len, buf, sizeof(buf));
00063     printf("radio-sniffer %d: packet length %d, %s\n", node_id, len, buf);
00064   }
00065 }
00066 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00067 PROCESS_THREAD(radio_sniffer_process, ev, data)
00068 {
00069   PROCESS_BEGIN();
00070 
00071   tr1001_init();
00072   tr1001_driver.set_receive_function(sniffer_callback);
00073 
00074   printf("Radio sniffer started.\n");
00075 
00076   while(1) {
00077     PROCESS_WAIT_EVENT();
00078   }
00079   PROCESS_END();
00080 }
00081 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00082 void
00083 init_net(void)
00084 {
00085 }
